acts.what: AATT with HTML CodeSniffer WCAG 2.1 AA ruleset

result.msg: Interfering with a user agent's ability to zoom may be a failure of this Success Criterion.
result.code:
<meta name="viewport"
content="width=device-width,
initial-scale=1,
shrink-to-fit=no,
maximum-scale=1">

result.msg: Accessible name for this element does not contain the visible label text. Check that for user interface components with labels that include text or images of text, the name contains the text that is presented visually.
result.code:
<a aria-label="Click here
to see Privacy Policy"
class="h1-cookie-privacy-link"
href="/privacy-and-cookies"
target="_blank"> Cookie
Policy</a>

result.code:

aria-label="accept"
class="btn h1-cookie-btn
cookie-accept"

t">OK</button>
